title: DevSync
desc: This is a mock-up of the developer-friendly communication app, Slack. I used the MERN stack with user auth, custom CSS, and Socket.io to broadcast messages to other users.

title: Arcade
desc: This is a recreation of the classic memory game Simon, Snake, and Bomberman using vanilla JavaScript and DOM manipulation.

title: Thought Shower
desc: This is a forum-inspired social media app for developers to share ideas using the MERN stack with user auth and Bootstrap CSS. Made as part of a team with two other developers following best-practice git workflow.

title: Save
desc: This is a to-do list application with user auth created with Django templates, Python, and PostgreSQL. Made as part of a team with three other developers via sprints.
